price: አላህ ለሚሻው ሰው ሲሳይን የሚያሰፋ የሚያጠብም መሆኑን አያዩምን? በዚህ ውስጥ ለሚያምኑ ሕዝቦች አስደናቂ ምልክቶች አልሉበት፡፡
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw anna al-laha yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yu'minūna
